info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 9:23PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR EASTERN NOTTOWAY AND WEST CENTRAL DINWIDDIE COUNTIES... At 922 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wilsons to Spainville, moving south to southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Wilsons around 930 PM EDT. Blackstone around 935 PM EDT. Fort Pickett around 955 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Wellville, North Wellville, Dominy Corner, Hebron, Clay Store, Blackstone Airport, Darvills and Pattersons Store. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
